import React, { Component } from "react"; class RideInfo extends Component { state = {}; render() { const ride = ""; return (
Departure: {ride.date} at {ride.time}

{ride.userName}

4 Rating

FROM

{ride.from}
⇢

TO

{ride.to}

${ride.price}

Stops: {ride.stops}

); } } export default RideInfo;
